name: AppStore Screenshot Template
description:
Hey Design Lovers,

There are some little things that we often forget when designing, and here is one of them.


It can be overlooked but its essential for a good design handoff experience.

Here is an app store Screenshot template designed by me to help reduce the workload of designing from Scratch.

PS: It can be used for both android and IOS.


Let me know what you think and like follow me on all social media.
